channel.title: Woodworking on Nathan Melehan
channel.description: Recent content in Woodworking on Nathan Melehan

item.title: Work Desk Routing Project
item.description: This is just a photo series of a work desk I have been building. There’s a location in Philadelphia called NextFab that has a bunch of useful tooling, and I’m enjoying this project a lot: NextFab. The table measures about 2.5’ wide by 7’ long, and it’s a standing height desk: Assembled, pre-routing The plywood was not the highest level of furniture-grade, so it was cheaper, but it also meant that it had some ugly imperfections on the surface.
